entry.title: [CW] Would it be good idea to have regular "practical life advice" thread like "welln
entry.content:
Would it be good idea to have regular "practical life advice" thread like "wellness wendesday" is for health and fitness?
Thread dedicated to questions about education, jobs, money, "what gizmo should I buy" "my gizmo broke, how to fix it" and any other real life problems you can imagine.
